name: Lilly's Library Service
description:
How to play:

WASD or arrows to move.

Click and drag books to your basket (up to 4 books) or to any library.

Game has two phases

First you will receive new books from the rightmost library.

Then a client will arrive at the leftmost window asking for some of your books.

You have limited time, be tidy, failing the clients request or getting your incoming books library overfilled will end the game!
